main event: Radar operator observed an object moving very rapidly at speeds of 3000-4000 mph at around 45,000 ft altitude on 8 Nov 59, Kansas City, Kansas.
interesting points: The object displayed erratic movement, disappearing and reappearing on radar,The sighting lasted for 15-20 minutes with no visual confirmation, A witness reported a strange flickering light hovering 4 miles west of Kansas City on 8 Nov 56,The object was described as circular and 40-50 ft in diameter with red and green lights by another witness in 1961, There are various reports of bright white objects observed in the Kansas City area across different dates.
